Value.label: Toggle Binary Report
Value.Help: Toggle the sensor binary report value when the Magnet switch is opened/closed. Configuration Value - Description 0x00 - Open: 00, Close: FF (Detect Wet) 0x01 - Open: FF, Close: 00 (Detect Dry)

Value.label: Enable Wake Up
Value.Help: Enable wake up 10 minutes when the power is switched on.

Value.label: Toggle Basic Set Value
Value.Help: Toggle the basic set value when the Magnet switch is opened/closed. Configuration Value - Description 0x00 - Close->Open: 00, Open->Close: FF (Detect Wet) 0x01 - Close->Open: FF, Open->Close: 00 (Detect Dry)

Value.label: Water Level Report
Value.Help:
Possible Bits Set (PBS): PBS = 0000 0000 0000 0000 0001 0001 0001 0001
Bit Descriptions: PBS & 0x00001000 - Alarm: Signals that Water Sensor sends (1) or does not send (0) Alarm Command when water switch is opened/closed. PBS & 0x00000100 - Basic Set: Signals that Water Sensor sends (1) or does not send (0) Basic Set Command when magnet switch is opened/closed. PBS & 0x00000010 - Sensor Binary: Signals that Water Sensor sends (1) or does not send (0) Sensor Binary Report when magnet switch is opened/closed. PBS & 0x00000001 - Battery: Signals that Water Sensor sends (1) or does not send (0) battery Report when magnet switch is opened/closed.

Value.label: Reset Configuration
Value.Help: Reset the configuration settings to factory defaults.
